title: [CET] Admission to B Tech CS or B Tech in AI ML through DCET 2025
content:
I wanted to know what the fees structure will be if I get into PESU Ring road Campus  
from 2nd year to 4th year what would be the fees for each year  
In the option entry list it is showing it will be 1.12L apart from the no refundable admission fees  
But I would still like to clarify that the fees will be the same   
and if anyone are from PG I would like to know what the pricing will be each month for the PG and other expenses including going out with your friends and all

comments.body: If you are coming through DCET, then the fees will be same for all the 3 years + you have to pay an extra 10k if you want to get MRD/CNR scholarship.
